revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Arcadyan |model=AR7516A |revision=AW22 3-A-OT (2L) |est_release_date=11/01/2011 |is_manuf=Yes |fcc_date=11/24/2010 |fcc_id=RAXAR7516VW |pcb_id=141751620007J |type=wireless router, dsl modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63281 |cpu1_cspeed=320 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406E |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68B16CWQD-25H |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, J1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43227 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |flags=ADSL2+ |stock_boot=CFE;(vendor modified); |tp_firmware=OpenWrt (unofficially) |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=BrightBox-XXXXXX,EE-Bright-Box-XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^BrightBox-[a-z0-9]{6}$,,,^EE-Bright-Box-[a-z0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |oui=1C:C6:3C,84:9C:A6,74:31:70 |oui_eth=1C:C6:3C,84:9C:A6,74:31:70 }} Also known as the '''Orange Bright Box''' or '''EE Bright Box 1''' in the UK.
*[https://openwrt.org/toh/arcadyan/ar7516 ''Arcadyan AR7516'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki]. :"141751620007J R01" and "1144" (11/2011) :is silkscreened on the board in the photos.
See also [[Arcadyan ARV7519]] (Infineon/Atheros).. and :[[Buffalo WBMR-HP-G300H]] (FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/RAXAR7516VW RAXAR7516VW])
==Images== There are some [https://www.flickr.com/photos/22008695@N03/sets/72157629056125153/with/6771581419/ PCB pictures on flickr] <!-- but unfortunately they're under an "all rights reserved" licence. --> [[File:Orange_Bright_Box_1.JPG|200px|thumb|left|External]]
